collector:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
collector:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card from the Collection.
collector:Contemplate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your Collection to draw.

collector:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
collector:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat.

collector:SpiritLeech.NAME: Spirit Leech
collector:SpiritLeech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, deal !D! damage again.

collector:ScorchingRay.NAME: Scorching Ray
collector:ScorchingRay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

collector:Ember.NAME: Ember
collector:Ember.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Retain. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: These embers must be lit, not played.

collector:SparkStrike.NAME: Spark Strike
collector:SparkStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Ember into your hand.

collector:Agonize.NAME: Inflict Agony
collector:Agonize.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is not collector:Afflicted, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable.

collector:GreenGaze.NAME: Green Gaze
collector:GreenGaze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you played a Collected card this turn, gain !B! Block.

collector:ActOfAggression.NAME: Act of Aggression
collector:ActOfAggression.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

collector:FairTrade.NAME: Fair Trade
collector:FairTrade.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Draw !M! cards from the Collection.

collector:Summoning.NAME: Summoning
collector:Summoning.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, add *Dark *Gaze into your hand.

collector:DarkGaze.NAME: Dark Gaze
collector:DarkGaze.DESCRIPTION: Apply collector:Doom equal to unused Block last turn.

collector:Forgery.NAME: Forgery
collector:Forgery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card in your hand. NL Add an Ethereal copy into your hand.

collector:DarkwoodKindling.NAME: Darkwood Kindling
collector:DarkwoodKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:Hoard.NAME: Hoard
collector:Hoard.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL This turn, they Retain and are Unplayable.

collector:Coerce.NAME: Coerce
collector:Coerce.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Apply !M! collector:Doom to ALL enemies.

collector:IllTakeThat.NAME: I'll Take That
collector:IllTakeThat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Steal the enemy's Block.

collector:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
collector:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 1 card. NL If it was named Prayer, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

collector:FeelMyPain.NAME: Feel My Pain
collector:FeelMyPain.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, a random enemy loses !M! HP.

collector:DanseMacabre.NAME: Danse Macabre
collector:DanseMacabre.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, enemies with Weak or Vulnerable lose !M! HP. NL Enemies with both lose !clm2!.

collector:Invocation.NAME: Invocation
collector:Invocation.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve. NL Exhaust.

collector:Arrogance.NAME: Arrogance
collector:Arrogance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack this turn applies !M! collector:Doom.

collector:Flamestrike.NAME: Flamestrike
collector:Flamestrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust all Unplayable cards in your hand and apply !M! collector:Doom for each.

collector:AshesAndDust.NAME: Ashes and Dust
collector:AshesAndDust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL If you've Exhausted a card this turn, gain !M! collector:Reserve.

collector:SapStrength.NAME: Sap Strength
collector:SapStrength.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Strength, steal 1 Strength.

collector:ShadowDaggers.NAME: Shadow Daggers
collector:ShadowDaggers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Collected card played this combat.

collector:LanternFlare.NAME: Lantern Flare
collector:LanternFlare.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! collector:Doom to a random enemy.

collector:WhirlingFlame.NAME: Whirling Flame
collector:WhirlingFlame.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards.

collector:Heatwave.NAME: Heat Wave
collector:Heatwave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to collector:Afflicted enemies. NL Gain an *Ember.

collector:Suffering.NAME: Suffering
collector:Suffering.DESCRIPTION: When you apply Weak or Vulnerable to an enemy, also apply !M! collector:Doom to them.

collector:ProtectingCall.NAME: Protecting Call
collector:ProtectingCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. At the start of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, gain !clm2! Block.

collector:BindingCall.NAME: Binding Call
collector:BindingCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. Whenever you lose all your Temporary_HP, apply !clm2! collector:Doom to ALL enemies.

collector:CantTouchThis.NAME: Can't Touch This
collector:CantTouchThis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL When you fully block an attack, apply !clm2! collector:Doom to the attacker.

collector:Empower.NAME: Empower
collector:Empower.DESCRIPTION: Gain X Strength at the start of your next !M! turns.

collector:VolatileKindling.NAME: Volatile Kindling
collector:VolatileKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, add a *Strike into your hand and upgrade it !M! times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:MiniCurse.NAME: Mini-Curse
collector:MiniCurse.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable.
collector:MiniCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

collector:Finalize.NAME: Finalize
collector:Finalize.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy dies this turn, heal !clm2! HP. NL Apply !M! collector:Doom.

collector:MysteryWeaving.NAME: Mystery Weaving
collector:MysteryWeaving.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Grants 2 less Block for each other card in your hand.

collector:CursedWail.NAME: Cursed Wail
collector:CursedWail.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL collector:Afflicted enemies lose 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

collector:CursedKindling.NAME: Cursed Kindling
collector:CursedKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:EndlessKindling.NAME: Endless Kindling
collector:EndlessKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. If this card is Exhausted, draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:DoubleTrouble.NAME: Double Trouble
collector:DoubleTrouble.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Collected card this turn is played twice.

collector:BrainDrain.NAME: Brain Drain
collector:BrainDrain.DESCRIPTION: Add the enemy's Collected card into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

collector:DarkstormBarrage.NAME: Darkstorm Barrage
collector:DarkstormBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! collector:Doom. NL Whenever a card is Exhausted, if this is in your hand, increase its collector:Doom by !clm2!.

collector:StashAway.NAME: Stash Away
collector:StashAway.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 collector:Reserve. NL Double your collector:Reserve. NL Exhaust.

collector:CoffinNail.NAME: Coffin Nail
collector:CoffinNail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is Exhausted, return it to your hand with !M! more damage.

collector:Kill.NAME: Power Word: Kill
collector:Kill.DESCRIPTION: Only collector:Reserves may be spent on this. NL Deal !D! damage.

collector:MegaWallop.NAME: MegaWallop
collector:MegaWallop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Temporary_HP equal to unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

collector:TorchlightTackle.NAME: Torchlight Tackle
collector:TorchlightTackle.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Temporary_HP.

collector:Butcher.NAME: Butcher
collector:Butcher.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, repeat this twice.
collector:Butcher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, repeat this twice.

collector:Crackle.NAME: Crackle
collector:Crackle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve.
collector:Crackle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 collector:Reserve.

collector:Omen.NAME: Omen
collector:Omen.DESCRIPTION: Attacking an collector:Afflicted enemy consumes 1 Weak and Vulnerable. When it does, they lose !M! HP.

collector:DarkLordForm.NAME: Dark Lord Form
collector:DarkLordForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Your Collected cards are played twice.
collector:DarkLordForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Collected cards are played twice.

collector:Soulforge.NAME: Soulforge
collector:Soulforge.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an *Ember into your hand.
collector:Soulforge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add an *Ember into your hand.

collector:YouAreMine.NAME: You Are Mine!
collector:YouAreMine.DESCRIPTION: Steal the target's Block and Artifact. NL Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable, and collector:Doom.

collector:DarkApotheosis.NAME: Dark Apotheosis
collector:DarkApotheosis.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade the Collection for the rest of combat. NL Exhaust.

collector:Goodbye.NAME: Goodbye
collector:Goodbye.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's collector:Doom. NL Exhaust.
collector:Goodbye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's collector:Doom. NL Exhaust.

collector:SunbloomKindling.NAME: Sunbloom Kindling
collector:SunbloomKindling.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is Exhausted, gain !M! Strength and add !M! *Embers into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I must light this kindling to use it.

collector:ReceiveTribute.NAME: Receive Tribute
collector:ReceiveTribute.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Choose 1 of !M! Boss cards and add it into your hand. NL Exhaust.

collector:Extricate.NAME: Extricate
collector:Extricate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is collector:Afflicted, play the top card of your draw pile.

collector:RagingCall.NAME: Raging Call
collector:RagingCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL At the end of your turn, if you have Temporary_HP, deal !clm2! damage to ALL enemies.

collector:DarkGrasp.NAME: Dark Grasp
collector:DarkGrasp.DESCRIPTION: collector:Pyre. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain a copy of the exhausted card.

collector:AlwaysMore.NAME: Always More
collector:AlwaysMore.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 additional Collected card each turn.

collector:MastersCall.NAME: Master's Call
collector:MastersCall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary_HP. NL Whenever you play an Attack, if you have Temporary_HP, deal !clm2! damage to a random enemy.

collector:GrabBag.NAME: Grab Bag
collector:GrabBag.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 Collected cards. NL Gain !M! collector:Reserve. NL Exhaust.

collector:HoardersStrike.NAME: Hoarder's Strike
collector:HoardersStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain collector:Reserve equal to its cost.

collector:FiendFire.NAME: Fiend Fire
collector:FiendFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in your hand. NL Deal !D! damage for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

collector:LouseCard.NAME: Louse
collector:LouseCard.DESCRIPTION: The next time you receive unblocked attack damage, gain !B! Block and 1 Blur.

collector:AcidSlimeCard.NAME: Acid Slime
collector:AcidSlimeCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. NL Add a copy of it into your hand.

collector:SpikeSlimeCard.NAME: Spike Slime
collector:SpikeSlimeCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Slimed into your discard pile.

collector:MadGremlinCard.NAME: Mad Gremlin
collector:MadGremlinCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL If you receive unblocked attack damage this turn, add a copy of this into your hand.

collector:ThievesCard.NAME: Thieves
collector:ThievesCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less damage for the next !M! turns.

collector:FungiBeastCard.NAME: Fungi Beast
collector:FungiBeastCard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

collector:SphericGuardianCard.NAME: Spheric Guardian
collector:SphericGuardianCard.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

collector:ChosenCard.NAME: Chosen
collector:ChosenCard.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy does not intend to attack, apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

collector:SneckoCard.NAME: Snecko
collector:SneckoCard.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL sneckomod:Muddle your hand.

collector:DarklingsCard.NAME: Darklings
collector:DarklingsCard.DESCRIPTION: Your next 2 cards this turn are played twice.

collector:OrbWalkerCard.NAME: Orb Walker
collector:OrbWalkerCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! *Embers into your hand.

collector:WrithingMassCard.NAME: Writhing Mass
collector:WrithingMassCard.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Play the top card of your draw pile.
